name: Fight back to the 80's
description:
This is my first game, being built using Unity for Android and iOS.

It’s a match 3 style with Battle Royale functionality (99 players), which I don’t think has been done before.

It’s got rogue like Ai players at the moment but will add actual multiplayer in a future release.

I went with a retro style/theme.

It’s pretty simple right now but soon adding features to it.

Any Feedback is appreciated.

Game will. be released on 19th September on iOS and Android and here are the links to beta test and Pre-order :)

Pre-Order:

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/detailsid=com.fightback.fightbacktothe80s

iPhone: https://apps.apple.com/au/app/fight-back-to-the-80s/id1476139801

Beta Test:

Android: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.fightback.fightbacktothe80s

iPhone: https://testflight.apple.com/join/xt9cIUk1

Game Description:

Match 3 meets battle royale in Fight Back to the 80’s!

It’s a manic, chaotic battle to survive in Fight Back to the 80s, a match 3 game with a battle royale twist! Focusing on speed, strategy and quick-thinking, Fight Back to the 80’s requires you to match 3 or more 80’s themed pop culture icons!

THE FIRST MATCH 3 BATTLE ROYALE
With 99 AI Players, only one can leave victorious

80’s RETRO THEMED MATCH 3
From epic lasers to hidden easter eggs, travel back in time!

10 MINUTE GAME
Games are fast paced, intense and over within 10 minutes
